title: Calling static getTax method - determine result

content.question: What, if anything, is printed as a result of executing the code segment?

choices.label: Nothing is printed because the method call should be PurchaseManager.getTax(100.0).
Nothing is printed because the return value from getTax cannot be assigned to the variable tax.

skill.text: 3.C: Determine the result or output based on code that contains procedural abstractions.
